item.title: AWFIS Space Solutions Ltd Stock Hits All-Time Low Amidst Prolonged Downtrend

item.title: E2E Networks Ltd Surges to Upper Circuit on Robust Buying Pressure
item.description: E2E Networks Ltd, a small-cap player in the IT - Hardware sector, witnessed a remarkable surge on 18 Feb 2026, hitting its upper circuit limit with a 20.0% gain. The stock closed at ₹3,068.20, marking a maximum daily price band increase of ₹511.30. This sharp rally was driven by robust buying interest, significant turnover, and a regulatory freeze on further trading, reflecting intense demand that remained unfilled throughout the session. Time: 26 minutes ago

item.title: Waaree Energies Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Mixed Price Action
item.description: Waaree Energies Ltd (WAAREEENER) has witnessed a significant 18.7% rise in open interest in its derivatives segment, signalling heightened market activity and shifting investor positioning. Despite this surge, the stock underperformed its sector and broader indices, reflecting a complex interplay between bullish bets and profit-taking pressures. Time: 26 minutes ago

item.title: ICICI Lombard Sees Significant Open Interest Surge Amid Positive Market Momentum
item.description: ICICI Lombard General Insurance Company Ltd has witnessed a notable surge in open interest (OI) in its derivatives segment, signalling increased market participation and potential directional bets. The stock’s recent performance, coupled with rising volumes and improved investor sentiment, suggests a shift in market positioning that merits close attention from traders and investors alike. Time: 26 minutes ago

item.title: BLB Ltd Surges to Upper Circuit on Strong Buying Momentum Amid Elevated Volatility
item.description: BLB Ltd, a micro-cap player in the Non Banking Financial Company (NBFC) sector, witnessed a remarkable surge on 18 Feb 2026, hitting its upper circuit limit with an 18.44% gain. The stock’s strong buying momentum, coupled with heightened investor participation and significant unfilled demand, propelled it to close near its daily price band ceiling, signalling robust market interest despite a cautious sector backdrop. Time: 26 minutes ago
